page.title: 20A Traffic Survey Report
page.content: We carried out our{Survey}on the main road outside our school,the{A827. We first of all drew our chart to take down our results.We then went out in groups of two to count the vehicles which passed from Aberfeldy to Pitlochry and also the opposite way. We found there were more cars than anything else.There were 84 cars going to{Aberfeldy}and 103 vehicles altogether in 1 hour and 10 minutes. Going to{Pitlochry}in the same time were 95 cars and 124 vehicles in all. Our survey was carried out between 11.10 hours and 12.20 hours on a Friday. We found out that there were more vehicles going towards Pitlochry than Aberfeldy.There were no buses although we are on a main tourist route and there were not so many farm vehicles as we had expected.
